title: Boutique Malaysia Hot Spring Eco-Villas with Massages, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Cradled by waterfall-clad limestone mountains and lush prehistoric rainforest, The Banjaran Hotsprings Retreat offers new heights of secluded, wellness-focused luxury, all just moments from Ipoh, one of Malaysia’s most spellbinding heritage cities. Boasting just 44 boutique villas - each offering private access to the resort’s restorative natural hot springs - this retreat offers everything you need to discover bliss in paradise. Celebrate the flavours of Malaysia at Pomelo or sip fine wines by stalactite and candlelight at the one-of-a-kind Jeff’s Cellar.

The Banjaran Hotsprings Retreat features a bespoke wellness program drawing on ancient Malay treatments to renew and rejuvenate. Sign up for a range of treatments, ranging from acupuncture and gua-sha to Ayurvedic massages and Himalayan salt scrubs and marvel at newfound serenity.
offer_address: No. 1, Persiaran Lagun Sunway 3, Sunway City Ipoh, 31150 Ipoh, Perak Darul Ridzuan, Malaysia
